class.name: filter/voxel_grid
class.description:
Wrapping of pcl::VoxelGrid filter. Downsample point cloud data by overlapping a grid of voxels, with user specified dimensions.
It creates a 3D voxel grid (think about a voxel grid as a set of tiny 3D boxes in space) over the input point cloud data. Then, in each voxel (i.e., 3D box), all the points present will be approximated (i.e., downsampled) with their centroid. This approach is a bit slower than approximating them with the center of the voxel, but it represents the underlying surface more accurately.
